repo.description: Small GitHub utilities like pull-status and changelog generator
repo.name: hs-github-tools

body:
A duplicate of #123 with additional commits that automatically address incorrect style, created by [Restyled][]. :warning: Even though this PR is not a Fork, it contains outside contributions. Please review accordingly. Since the original Pull Request was opened as a fork in a contributor's repository, we are unable to create a Pull Request branching from it with only the style fixes. The following Restylers [made fixes](https://restyled.io/gh/TokTok/repos/hs-github-tools/jobs/1379761): - [autopep8](https://github.com/hhatto/autopep8) - [black](https://github.com/python/black) - [shellharden](https://github.com/anordal/shellharden#readme) - [shfmt](https://github.com/mvdan/sh#shfmt) - [yapf](https://github.com/google/yapf) To incorporate these changes, you can either: 1. Merge this Pull Request *instead of* the original, or 1. Ask your contributor to locally incorporate these commits and push them to the original Pull Request
Expand for example instructions ```console git remote add upstream https://github.com/TokTok/hs-github-tools.git git fetch upstream pull//head git merge --ff-only FETCH_HEAD git push ```
**NOTE**: As work continues on the original Pull Request, this process will re-run and update (force-push) this Pull Request with updated style fixes as necessary. If the style is fixed manually at any point (i.e. this process finds no fixes to make), this Pull Request will be closed automatically. Sorry if this was unexpected. To disable it, see our [documentation][]. [restyled]: https://restyled.io [documentation]: https://github.com/restyled-io/restyled.io/wiki/Disabling-Restyled --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/hs-github-tools/124)

Thank you for your submission! We really appreciate it. Like many open source projects, we ask that you all sign our [Contributor License Agreement](https://cla-assistant.io/TokTok/hs-github-tools?pullRequest=124) before we can accept your contribution.
**1** out of **2** committers have signed the CLA.

:white_check_mark: iphydf
:x: restyled-commits
You have signed the CLA already but the status is still pending? Let us [recheck](https://cla-assistant.io/check/TokTok/hs-github-tools?pullRequest=124) it.

commit.message:
feat: Add `check_release` script, used by other repos.

We put it here so it can be independently updated and shared across
repos.
